name: Return Stroke Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Be numbed by the reverberation! To the depths of your bones!

name: Return Stroke Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, retire it, and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: Be numbed by the reverberation! To the depths of your bones!

name: Relation Weaver, Petralka
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], reveal the top seven cards of your deck, if all of the revealed cards not named "Relation Weaver, Petralka" have different card names, choose up to one of the revealed cards, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. If you chose "Relation Weaver, Petralka", ride it as [Stand] instead of calling it to (RC), and it gets drive -1 until end of turn. Shuffle your deck. ([Power] +10000 when riding as well)
flavor: Each and every bond means the world, that's why we remain connected.

name: Fountain of Knowledge, Eva
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of Research cards in your Order Zone, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], search your deck or hand for up to one card with "Obscudeid" in its card name, and call it to (RC). If you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.
[Glitter]
